summary: Just a simple mode to restrict races from doing certain actions.
descriptionHtml:
[Description]

- This is my second mod, just messing with CK to get some pratice but at same time restrict some races from doing certains actions, I made this mod because I enjoy not to have some races not able to equip some weapons, running slower than other races and even taller..
I\'ll update with more, I would love some feedback and comments about bugs or tweaking.

[FAQ]

-A: Why did you increased Height & Weight ?
-R: Because almost every race has the same Height & Weight.

-A: Races are meant to be unbalanced ?
-R: The goal on this mod isn\'t to unbalance races but to make a little more realist, it\'s not unbalanced, just each race has their own roleplay.

[Race Roleplay]

- High Elf: Magical-Thief
- Argonian: Assassin-Thief Defensive 
- Wood Elf: Archer
[Installation]

Option A- Manually extract the file to your Skyrim/Data folder.
Option B- Manually download the file, open your Skyrim Mod Manager and on your left side there\'s a blue button, click on that and add the file you downloaded.

[Uninstallation]

Option A- Manually remove Race Restrictions.esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.
Option B- Open your Skyrim Mod Manager, on left side press second blue button and it will auto remove the file.

[Changelog]

- Version 1.00
** Oficial Release.
**High Elf:

- Added +10 HP
- Added +25 Magicka
- Reduced Weight by 50 (Why !? Elves are supposed to have Thin Body)
- Increased Male Height to 1.93
- Increased Male Weight (Tall body = Bones are heavier)
- Increased Female Height to 1.828
- Increased Female Weight
- Increased Female Acceleration
- HighElves are not capable of equip Daggers, Axe, Mace, 2 Handed Sword and 2 Handed Axe
- Increased Attack Reach (Since height has been increased, their arms are long.)

- Version 1.10
** Any Race as Vampire will have additional attributes:
-* Some attributes when you were a Human 
* No shadow, HP, Magicka & Stam regen slightly increased
Magical Classes:
* +5 HP 
* +10 Magicka
* +10 Stamina
Melee Classes:
* +10 HP
* +5 Magicka
* +10 Stamina
* Slightly Increased Acceleration
* Slightly Increased Unarmed Damage
* Their skin tone and lips are slightly darker
* Can breathe in water (New Spell for Vampires)

** High Elf:

- They capable of equip Daggers.

**Argonian

- They can fight in water
- Added +30 HP
- Added +10 Stamina
- Health Regen Slightly Increased
- Increased Male Height to 1.3150
- Increased Male Weight
- Increased Female Height to 1.2930
- Increased Female Weight
- Slightly Increased Acceleration
- Slightly Increased Unarmed Reach
- They are not capable of equip Axe, Mace, 2 Handed Sword & Axe, Staff and Shield
- Tweaked Attack Power for Dual Wield (Slightly changes)

**Wood Elf:

- Removed the +5 Additional from Alchemy and added into Archery
- Added +15 HP
- Added +5 Stamina
- Reduced Carry Weight by 40
- HP Regen Slightly Increased
- Stamina Regen Slightly Increased
- Increased Male Height to 1.7300
- Increased Male Weight
- Increased Female Height to 1.6253
- Increased Female Weight
- Slightly Increased Unarmed Reach
- Wood Elves are not capable of equip Shield, Staff, Sword, Axe, Mace and 2 Handed Sword or Axe
author: TweakDev
